TopicTitle: KSP Won't update and will crash upon starting

Articles.Content:
Hello, 

I have two problems, first KSP will not update, and second KSP 32 bit will not run.

  1. KSP will not update.  Every time I run the launcher I get up to 93% and then this happens.  It downloads a zipped version of the Launcher.win folder too.
Spoiler

2. The second problem is that when I try to start up KSP 32 bit version, the screen just turns black with a pink bar at the bottom.  64 bit, however, will run smoothly up until it hits its max memory usage, about halfway through loading the mods (which is why I don't use it).

Spoiler

Here are the logs: https://www.dropbox.com/home/KSP%20Logs?preview=output_log.txt

I am playing with these mods (all of which are either 1.1 compatible or are confirmed to work in 1.1 despite being 1.05):

  1. Aviator Arsenal (BD Armory expansion)
  2. B9 Aerospace HX
  3. B9 Aerospace
  4. BD FPS (BD Armory expansion)
  5. BD Armory
  6. CAL (BD Armory expansion)
  7. Community Resource Pack
  8. FS Hangar Extender 
  9. Interstellar Fuel Switch
  10. KAS
  11. KerbalTek Hyperedit
  12. KIS
  13. Malfunc Industries (BD Armory expansion)
  14. MechJeb2
  15. Module Manager
  16. MTW (BD Armory expansion)
  17. NAS (BD Armory expansion)
  18. North Kerbin Weaponry (BD Armory expansion)
  19. P.E.W. (BD Armory expansion)
  20. Resources (not sure if this is a mod or part of standard, I forgot)
  21. SmokeScreen (not sure if this is a mod or part of standard, I forgot)
  22. Tweak-Scale

Note: Most mods listed as BD Armory Expansions can be found on the BD Armory homepage.

If anyone has any idea of how to help short of redownloading it (then I lose all of my progress), please help me!

Thanks for reading!

 

Edited May 7, 2016 by TwinKerbal
Forgot to tell some important info
